verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
YOU ARE MY EVERYTHING.
You are my all in all; the song that I sing; the
answer when I call. You are my everything. You
are my all in all. Itâ€™s in You that my life is blessed;
You are my righteousness; You are my all in all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my everything. You are my all in all. The
strength of my life, You lift me when I fall.
You are my everything. You are my all in all.
You're my Father who cares for me. You have
created me. You are my all in all.
